job.title: Jr. Software Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Hospital & Health Care
job.description: stronguPosition SummarybrbrustrongStratasans mission is to collaborate with hospitals and help them make better more informed strategic growth decisions Every employee here cares deeply about achieving that mission and we work tirelessly to build and support products that will help them succeedbrbrIn the Software Engineer role you will build new features and products closely collaborating with our Product and Data Services teams to deliver delightful software We have written about how our Engineering team works at engineeringstratasancom as a resource for new and potential team membersbrbrstrong In the role you will brstrongulli Work with the Engineering team to develop and maintain webbased products and tools lili Implement best practices in software development emphasizing security and stability lili Write automated tests to ensure quality work and prevent introduction of regressions lili Work with other team members to translate business requirements into technical specifications lili Manage time to meet deadlines brliulstrong You will love this job if brstrongulli You enjoy working with responsible developers and can clearly communicate complex engineering challenges and decisions lili You have a strong attention to detail and are not afraid to speak honestly and openly about potential improvements to our products and process lili You feel strongly that shipping early and often is a great way to build software lili You are willing to grow and take initiative to improve the team and our products liul strong Why We Should Hear From You brstrongulli You have 2 or more years shipping production software on the web lili You have experience with relational data SQL and RDBMS like Postgres Postgres experience is not required however lili You are not afraid to work on both the front and backend though this role focuses primarily on the backend lili You have experience in healthcare technology though by no means is this required We can teach you healthcare lili You have experience with Python and Django though experience with similar languages and frameworks is valuable as well liul strong WFH strongstrong The Engineering Team works asynchronously relying on written communications in GitHub Slack and Jira Our team is 100 distributed Applicants must live and be authorized to work in the United States strongstrong Compensation strongstrong Compensation for this role is commensurate with experience strongstrong About Stratasan brbrstrongWhen you think healthcare data and analytics company whats the first thought that comes to mind That sounds like a super fun place to work Us too Though maybe were biasedbrbrOur bright diverse team of analysts engineers product developers and everyday dreamers are working to shake up the healthcare space and change the way hospitals use data and analytics Serving as a hub for business development intelligence we provide our clients with a foundation for growth in the areas of hospital planning marketing physician relations and expansionbrbrWere stronger because of customerfirst culture and our inclusive work environment Were a team of entrepreneuriallyminded selfmotivated healthcare aficionados and technology geeks Together we solve complex problems rethink conventional processes and celebrate big winsbrbrWere an equal opportunity employer All applicants will be considered for employment without attention to race color religion sex sexual orientation gender identity national origin veteran or disability status We believe our differences truly make us strongerbrbrInterested in joining a team of experts Were looking for passionate individuals interested in challenging the status quo of healthcare data and analytics Were open to your fresh thinking and creative ideas If you think we might be the right mix of innovative thinking and tech nerd to fit your professional style then shoot us your application todaybrbrEverybody Makes the CoffeebrbrWe help where help is needed Whether were asked to pitch in to support a customer run a meeting at the last minute or make the morning coffee everybody does whats necessary to keep the engine running We dont believe in pulling rankbrbrOur Success is My SuccessbrbrWe support one another strive for the success of our team and recognize that nothing is done alonebrbrWell Figure it OutbrbrWe may not immediately have the answer to a question but were always committed to finding one We believe most challenges are great opportunities to consciously show up and with a resourceful attitude brainstorm and consider the best course of action Whatever comes our way we wont quit until we find a solutionbrbrHonest Conversations Make Us StrongerbrbrWe approach conversations from a position of vulnerability We assume others have positive intentions and strive to see their perspective before sharing our own This combination allows us to create stronger more collaborative relationshipswhich ultimately is how we growbrbrstrong Assume Positive Intent brbrstrongWe believe its important to start from the assumption that people are good and that the intent behind their actions are positive We believe this builds stronger and more trusting relationshipsbrbremBy submitting your interest in this job you agree to receive text notifications with additional steps to complete your job application You will receive up to 6 messages from the number 63879 Message amp data rates may apply Please refer to our privacy policy for more informationem
